title: Nadal meets Manchester City stars Haaland, Grealish & Guardiola
description: Rafael Nadal is already making the most of his retirement. The Spaniard, who concluded his professional career at the Davis Cup Finals in Malaga last week, crossed paths with Manchester City’s star striker Erling Haaland at the City Football Academy in Manchester on Wednesday. [ATP APP] The 22-time Grand Slam champion also met fellow Spaniard and Manchester City manager, Pep Guardiola. Rafael Nadal with Pep Guardiola at the Manchester City Football Academy. Photo Credit: MCFC. He also caught up with the club's star players Bernando Silva, Jack Grealish and Manuel Akanji. Rafael Nadal with Jack Grealish at the Manchester City Football Academy. Photo Credit: MCFC.   After his visit to Manchester, the famously avid Real Madrid fan was present in the stands at Anfield, supporting his team facing Liverpool in UEFA Champions League action on Wednesday. [NEWSLETTER FORM]
excerpt: Rafael Nadal crossed paths with Manchester City star Erling Haaland, manager Pep Guardiola, and more at the City Football Academy in Manchester.

By ATP Staff Rafael Nadal is already making the most of his retirement. The Spaniard, who concluded his professional career at the Davis Cup Finals in Malaga last week, crossed paths with Manchester City’s star striker Erling Haaland at the City Football Academy in Manchester on Wednesday. The 22-time Grand Slam champion also met fellow Spaniard and Manchester City manager, Pep Guardiola. Rafael Nadal with Pep Guardiola at the Manchester City Football Academy. Photo Credit: MCFC. He also caught up with the club's star players Bernando Silva, Jack Grealish and Manuel Akanji. Rafael Nadal with Jack Grealish at the Manchester City Football Academy. Photo Credit: MCFC. After his visit to Manchester, the famously avid Real Madrid fan was present in the stands at Anfield, supporting his team facing Liverpool in UEFA Champions League action on Wednesday.
html:
Player News

Stars collide at the City Football Academy

November 29, 2024

MCFC

Rafael Nadal meets Manchester City stars Erling Haaland and Bernando Silva. By ATP Staff

Rafael Nadal is already making the most of his retirement.

The Spaniard, who concluded his professional career at the Davis Cup Finals in Malaga last week, crossed paths with Manchester City’s star striker Erling Haaland at the City Football Academy in Manchester on Wednesday.

The 22-time Grand Slam champion also met fellow Spaniard and Manchester City manager, Pep Guardiola.


Rafael Nadal with Pep Guardiola at the Manchester City Football Academy. Photo Credit: MCFC.

He also caught up with the club's star players Bernando Silva, Jack Grealish and Manuel Akanji.


Rafael Nadal with Jack Grealish at the Manchester City Football Academy. Photo Credit: MCFC.

After his visit to Manchester, the famously avid Real Madrid fan was present in the stands at Anfield, supporting his team facing Liverpool in UEFA Champions League action on Wednesday.
